i'm so fancy
won't you stay with me

i got one less problem without you
but you're all i need

what would i do without your smart mouth
we're too young now to amount to anything else
might sound crazy what i'm bout to say
she looks so perfect i'll marry her anyway

why you gotta be so rude
i'm only human too
and all of me loves all of you

wiggle wiggle wiggle, turn down for what

am i wrong for trying to reach the things

when i was at my worst down on my knees
now im following following to you
bang bang into the room

and all of me loves all of you

now i've got you in my space
and i'm all about that bass bout that bass

oh the haters gonna hate hate hate hate hate
and i'm all about that bass bout that bass

i got you shackled in my embrace
and i'm all about that bass bout that bass

we'd be all night in love
but i don't want none unless you got buns hun

i'm so fancy
won't you stay with me

i got one less problem without you
but you're all i need

i'm in the fast lane
this ain't love it's clear to see
I got one less problem without you but won't you stay with me

What's up you guys, This is Kurt and Sam.
And that was our 2014 Summer Pop medley. These

Pop Medleys have become a tradition for us
for the past few years so thank you for continuing

to watch and support it means a lot. And both
of us are coming to New York and New Jersey

to play a couple shows this November 22nd and
23rd. You can grab tickets to those at kurthugoschneider.com/tour.

We love coming out and playing live for you
guys and meeting you so we hope to see you

all there it's gonna be a ton of fun. Bye
guys.

title: Summer Pop Medley 2014 - Sam Tsui & Kurt Hugo Schneider

comments.text:
I feel bipolar after this... (0_o)

Alot of these songs have my precious memories, which makes me shed a tear, 
reminding me of last and this year like Am I wrong, All of me, Rude, 
Bang-Bang.

But some of these songs envigorate me, like Turn Down for What, Wiggle and 
Bang-Bang.

But I really started to cry when it came to Anaconda.. (I AM NOT JOKING)

Ahh the memories of me twerking in front of my classmates :D
﻿
